website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Downshifter 7 road running shoe was welcomed by a lot of shoe enthusiasts and novice runners. They were happy with this product’s affordable price and quality construction. The sizing scheme and width options were also given praise as they apparently adhered to people’s expectations. It accommodated the foot adequately and kept it comfortable, based on user feedback. On the other hand, some individuals felt that the in-shoe fit was narrow, that the wet-surface grip was dodgy, and that the overall construction wasn’t intended for hardcore workouts and runs.
pros: A majority of the testers commented on how comfortable the underfoot experience of the Nike Downshifter 7 was during their runs
The lightweight configuration of this running shoe gained fans who felt that it permitted them to effortlessly wear it all day
The trademark Nike swoosh is much appreciated by many consumers because it apparently gave the shoe that classic Nike look
The minimalist design allowed testers to use the shoe for activities other than running, like walking and circuit training
People liked the variety of color schemes that were available for this running shoe, stating that the options were pleasing to the eyes
Several users recognized the value of the shoe considering its build and features
The price of the Nike Downshifter 7 was affordable, and people flocked to this shoe because of it
Almost every consumer stated that the Nike Downshifter 7 had a sizing scheme that followed their preferences
The width profile was welcomed for being snug yet unrestrictive
cons: A few of those who have tested the Nike Downshifter 7 expressed how narrow the shoe felt despite getting the shoe in their usual width
A good number of reviews noted that this running shoe did not provide decent traction on wet surfaces
Several users stated that the shoes are more for casual wear or light exercise, and not so much for running long distances or extreme training

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable, durable, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: After reading about how the successful Kenyans run (on their toes, no need for air-filled heels), I tried a pair of these a couple of years ago as a relatively inexpensive, lightweight shoe for long-distance running. My first pair have finally worn down to a point where the soles are too slippery, but they have lasted well - they have taken me 1000 miles this year alone, including two marathons. They have always been comfortable, and are suitable for casual wear as well. So, I am happy to buy another pair to keep me running.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. A little tight but I have wide feet. I only use these for running and for that they are a good buy. I would imagine that they would look good on a 16 year old down the park drinking white lightning too.
customer_reviews.author: Smudgerellafella

customer_reviews.title: Size 12 - Fantastic Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these well over a year ago now for daily use. They are easy to clean and are very comfortable for everyday wear. Material has not faded over time as one might expect with a cheaper pair of trainers. Didn't have an issue with sizing. Only downside is that I don't find them to be supportive for exercising. Wore these when I wanted to go running and ended up with a knee injury for 3+ weeks as they don't seem to have the right sole build to absorb impact due to only being some kind of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Bought for running
customer_reviews.text: Bought for running (up to 3 miles every other day). Very very nice especially for the price. Fits quite snug but having read previous reviews I was expecting that so went up half a size. Very light and well structured around the heel and toe box. I will need an insole to help with arch support but thats not an issue. Sole has a nice spring to it and is quite low profile. Overall the shoe has good breathability and looks really nice. Might even buy a 2nd pair for work as I do a lot of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best and most comfortable gym shoes I've bought. Reasonable priced and comfortable for running on treadmills, outside, and general wear. I run about 3 times a week and these are still comfortable and by the most part undamaged over a year later. They've been through some pretty boggy fields and come out the other side of the washing machine still sparkling. All round a good, supportive and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good trainer. Used only in the gym and have not worn at all in the six months I have had them.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: nike
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, great fit, comfortable hasnt stopped wearing them
customer_reviews.author: netzbetz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Trainers I've had before good style and fit glad to have found a pair and we'll priced
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're okay. Cheap but only for or so do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It’s difficult to go back to wearing normal every-day shoes after wearing these! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had these type of trainers before the last well and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: nicholas ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable running shoes Just note they are a bit narrow at the top of the foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Feels perfectly comfortable, took it for my 5 km Morning jog and it felt so well. A great shoe with comfort
customer_reviews.author: CedricNanja

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable great value foe the money am very happy with these
customer_reviews.author: Andy's Tunes : R&B , RAP , HIP HOP , Etc....hMusic Videos /Biggie, pac, N.W.A, & OTHERS! COLDPLAY....

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size 12
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 12 with all trainers. These are too tight
customer_reviews.author: MR T WINGHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight trainer. Stylish and comfortable. Great service and packaged well. This is an official nike product with all the correct labels and packaging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: My son really loved these, light weight, turned up earlier than expected, the fit was just right. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, comfy, nice colour and easy to keep clean

customer_reviews.title: good Simple design Nike shoe
customer_reviews.text: lovely, minimalist, simple design Nike shoes. comfortable and cheap for only £35 in shops. bought the All black (Black-Anthracite) colour and using it Only for work. also bought it Half size Bigger because usual size is snug and not comfy.. narrow along the toe area. so get a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: via Amazon or Ebay

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Downshifter 7 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: One of nike's classic running shoe for men: the air Downshifter 7. This lightweight running shoe is breathable and supportive. It's constructed with a no-sew mesh upper, phylon midsole, padded collar/tongue, rubber outsole with deep flex grooves.
feature_bullets: The revolutionary Nike Free midsole features a contemporary three-star graphic pattern that expands and unfolds in any direction by following the natural movement of your foot.
The ultra-soft foam midsole helps cushion the impact while providing a pleasant feel from the output to the target.
